p: The HAdV-3 (CQ5291) and HAdV-7 strains (CQ4411) used in this study were originally isolated from NPAs of children infected with HAdV. The virus was purified using a standard cesium chloride gradient centrifugation procedure, as described [ 19]. The concentration of viral particles (VPs) was determined by spectrophotometry according to the A 260 value. The virus concentration was calculated as VPs/ml = A 260*dilution*10 12.
